title: The only mission I have is to complete missons
body: Can someone tell me how to get more missions? Also can't post in player recruitment because it say I'm not lvl 7 yet but I'm lvl 30 ?

replies.body:
Posting here synced your Boards account with your Summoner level, so you're now level 30 here as well! Feel free to post anywhere now ^_^!

The second set of Words missions are going to be released on Oct 2, not too much longer!
